name: STRIKER!
description:
STRIKER! is a Football Golf Action game that supports up to 4 players in local, 'pass-the-controller' multiplayer. Pass the ball from Striker to Striker, then slot it home into the goal. Take on your friends across 40 different levels set in five unique worlds, or go it alone and set some course records! 

Features:

- 40 distinct levels with a range of different mechanics to play against

- Customisable game options that can increase accessibility or give players and added challenge

- Level and World highscores

- Name and Kit customisation to make your team stand out

- Arcade-style controls that promote pick up and play Co-Op gameplay

- Dynamic replay system that lets your save your best moments.

- 3D Isometric gameplay with a rotatable camera.  

- Keyboard & Controller support

Controls:

Striker

X//SPACEBAR - Shoot/Confirm/Receive Ball

CIRCLE//C - Cancel Shot/Return

TRIANGLE//Y - Zoom out

Camera

D-PAD//WASD/ARROW KEYS - Pivot Camera/Move Menu

L1//COMMA  - Rotate Left

R1//PERIOD- Rotate Right
